item.description:
Golf 101 Lessons for New Golfers or Improve Your Game

"A Complete Hands-On Course Ideal For New Golfers And Anyone Who Wants To Improve Their Game‚Äù

"Golf 101 Starts At The Driving Range, And Then Brings You On The Course For Real Playing Experience"

Golf 101 starts out at the driving range, developing your swing, video swing analysis, golf rules, terms and strategy.

Next, we work on putting and chipping. The next lessons are on the golf course to play a scramble, learning about technique, course management, rules, and scoring.

All clubs, equipment, driving range fees, golf course fees, and golf balls are included, -or bring your own clubs.

The Golf 101 Lessons total 6 hours of hands-on instruction is only $100 ($17 per hour) and are taught by Certified Golf Professionals

Class size is kept small to ensure personal attention - the best value available in Golf Lessons anywhere!

RESERVE YOUR SPOT TODAY!

If you need to reschedule a class, just let us know.
We can reschedule you for a makeup session (48 Hour Notice is required)


Golf 101 is $100 for 6 hours of hands-on Golf Lessons

The next Golf 101 lessons are:



Saturday August 2 -3:30 to 5 pm
Saturday August 9 3:30 to 5 pm

or

Tuesday July 29 -6:30 to 8 pm
Tuesday August 5 -6:30 to 8 pm

___________________________________________________________________________

Choose your Golf 101 Scramble date:
Monday Aug 11 -6pm to 9pm or
Monday Aug 18 -6pm to 9pm or
Monday Aug 25 -6pm to 9pm


Golf 101 Lessons are held at:

Miner Hills Golf Course and Driving Range, 85 Miner Drive, Middletown, CT 06457 Take Exit 20 Country Club Road from I-91

From 91 South - Take exit 20, Left from exit ramp, Left on Country Club Road, Left on Minor Hills Drive, 1 mile on your Right -3 to 4:30 pm
item.how_to_find_us: Look for us in the white www.CTGolfTips.com hats
